overview: 1983 ‧ World cinema/Tamil cinema  Apoorva Sahodarigal is a 1983 Tamil Indian feature film directed by R.Thyagarajan. The film stars Karthik, Suresh, Radha, Suhasini and Urvashi in the lead roles. The film's music score has been done by Bollywood music director Bappi Lahiri. Wikipedia
title: Apoorva Sahodarigal
